languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, на Фолстоуне совершена невероятная находка! При реставрации склепа святого Кифы был найден утерянный том его дневников. Следуя записям подвижника, братья Ордена Молота смогли отыскать криптоковчег с техносвятыней святого Когнация — Горнилом. Писания Кифы о нем туманны, Горнило называется "ваятелем и преобразителем, несущим житие и благодать". Эксплораторы выслали делегацию и предъявили претензии на сокровище. Жаркий диспут идет уже много дней".

"An incredible find has been made on Foulstone, Lord Captain! A lost volume of Saint Keefe's diary has been discovered during the restoration of his crypt. By following the saint's words, the Order of the Hammer was able to find a cryptoark containing a tech-relic of Saint Cognatius — the Crucible. Keefe's writings on it are vague: it is called 'the sculptor and transformer, granting life and grace.' The Explorators have sent a delegation to lay claim to the treasure, which has sparked a heated dispute that has been going on for many days."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, на Фолстоуне совершена невероятная находка! При реставрации склепа святого Кифы был найден утерянный том его дневников. Следуя записям подвижника, братья Ордена Молота смогли отыскать криптоковчег с техносвятыней святого Когнация — Горнилом. Писания Кифы о нем туманны, Горнило называется "ваятелем и преобразителем, несущим житие и благодать". Эксплораторы выслали делегацию и предъявили претензии на сокровище. Жаркий диспут идет уже много дней".

traits.locale_text: "An incredible find has been made on Foulstone, Lord Captain! A lost volume of Saint Cephas's lost diary has been found during the restoration of his crypt. According to his records, the members of the Order of the Hammer were able to find the cryptoark containing a relic of Saint Cognatius —The Crucible. Cephas's writings on it are vague, it is called the 'the sculptor and transformer, granting life and grace'. The Explorators have sent a delegation and have made claims to the treasure. The heated dispute has been going on for many days"

Cephas's writings on it are vague, it is called the 'the sculptor and transformer, granting life and grace'. The Explorators have sent a delegation and have made claims to the treasure. The heated dispute has been going on for many days"

languages.text: “舰长大人，人们在荒寂岩地发现了不可思议的东西！在修缮圣基弗的墓地期间，人们发现了他的日记。重锤修会的成员根据这位圣人的记录，找到了圣科尼亚蒂乌斯的保险柜，里面装着‘熔炉’这件技术遗物。基弗对它的描述很模糊，我们只知道它是‘雕刻家与变形者，会赐予生命与优雅’。开拓者舰队听说这个消息之后，立刻派来了代表团，声称这些宝藏属于他们。双方势力展开了激烈的争论，已经持续了很多天。”
languages.original_text: "An incredible find has been made on Foulstone, Lord Captain! A lost volume of Saint Keefe's diary has been discovered during the restoration of his crypt. By following the saint's words, the Order of the Hammer was able to find a cryptoark containing a tech-relic of Saint Cognatius — the Crucible. Keefe's writings on it are vague: it is called 'the sculptor and transformer, granting life and grace.' The Explorators have sent a delegation to lay claim to the treasure, which has sparked a heated dispute that has been going on for many days."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，人们在荒寂岩地发现了不可思议的东西！在修缮圣基弗的墓地期间，人们发现了他的日记。重锤修会的成员根据这位圣人的记录，找到了圣科尼亚蒂乌斯的保险柜，里面装着‘熔炉’这件技术遗物。基弗对它的描述很模糊，我们只知道它是‘雕刻家与变形者，会赐予生命与优雅’。开拓者舰队听说这个消息之后，立刻派来了代表团，声称这些宝藏属于他们。双方势力展开了激烈的争论，已经持续了很多天。”
“舰长大人，人们在荒寂岩地发现了不可思议的东西！在修缮圣基弗的墓地之间，人们发现了他遗失的日记。重锤修会的成员根据他的记录，找到了藏有圣科尼亚蒂乌斯遗物的保险柜——‘熔炉’。基弗对它的描述很模糊，我们只知道它是‘雕刻家与变形者，会赐予生命与优雅’。开拓者舰队听说这个消息之后，立刻派来了代表团，声称这些宝藏属于他们。双方实力之间的激烈争论已经持续了许多天。
“舰长大人，人们在荒寂岩地发现了不可思议的东西！在修缮圣基弗的墓地之间，人们发现了他遗失的日记。重锤修会的成员根据他的记录，找到了藏有圣科尼亚蒂乌斯遗物的保险柜——‘熔炉’。基弗对它的描述很模糊，我们只知道它是‘雕刻家与变形者，会赐予生命与优雅’。开拓者舰队听说这个消息之后，立刻派来了代表团，声称这些宝藏属于他们。双方势力之间的激烈争论已经持续了许多天。

languages.text: «¡Se ha hecho un hallazgo increíble en Rocainmunda, Lord Capitán! Se ha descubierto un volumen perdido del diario de san Keefe durante la restauración de su cripta. La Orden del Martillo ha seguido las palabras del santo y ha dado con una criptoarca que contenía una tecnoreliquia de san Cognatius: el Crisol. Keefe no ofrece mucha información sobre él; tan solo lo llama "el escultor y transformador, dador de vida y gracia". Los exploradores han enviado una delegación para reclamar el tesoro, lo que ha causado una fuerte disputa que se ha alargado ya durante varios días».
languages.original_text: "An incredible find has been made on Foulstone, Lord Captain! A lost volume of Saint Keefe's diary has been discovered during the restoration of his crypt. By following the saint's words, the Order of the Hammer was able to find a cryptoark containing a tech-relic of Saint Cognatius — the Crucible. Keefe's writings on it are vague: it is called 'the sculptor and transformer, granting life and grace.' The Explorators have sent a delegation to lay claim to the treasure, which has sparked a heated dispute that has been going on for many days."

traits.locale_text: «¡Se ha hecho un hallazgo increíble en Rocainmunda, Lord Capitán! Se ha descubierto un volumen perdido del diario de san Keefe durante la restauración de su cripta. La Orden del Martillo ha seguido las palabras del santo y ha dado con una criptoarca que contenía una tecnoreliquia de san Cognatius: el Crisol. Keefe no ofrece mucha información sobre él; tan solo lo llama "el escultor y transformador, dador de vida y gracia". Los exploradores han enviado una delegación para reclamar el tesoro, lo que ha causado una fuerte disputa que se ha alargado ya durante varios días».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、ファウルストーンで信じられないような発見がありました！聖キーフの行方不明になっていた日記が地下墓地の修復中に発見されたのです。その記録によれば、鉄槌の修道会のメンバーは、聖コグナティウスの聖遺物...坩堝が入ったクリプトアークを発見することができたそうですよ。キーフの書いた内容は不明瞭で、 それを、'生命と恩寵を与える彫刻家と変容者 'と呼んでいます。エクスプロレイターは代表団を遣わして財宝を要求していて、激しい論争が何日も続いている状態です」
languages.original_text: "An incredible find has been made on Foulstone, Lord Captain! A lost volume of Saint Keefe's diary has been discovered during the restoration of his crypt. By following the saint's words, the Order of the Hammer was able to find a cryptoark containing a tech-relic of Saint Cognatius — the Crucible. Keefe's writings on it are vague: it is called 'the sculptor and transformer, granting life and grace.' The Explorators have sent a delegation to lay claim to the treasure, which has sparked a heated dispute that has been going on for many days."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、ファウルストーンで信じられないような発見がありました！聖セファの行方不明になっていた日記が地下墓地の修復中に発見されたのです。その記録によれば、鉄槌の修道会のメンバーは、聖コグナティウスの聖遺物...坩堝が入ったクリプトアークを発見することができたそうですよ。セファの書いた内容は不明瞭で、 それを、'生命と恩寵を与える彫刻家と変容者 'と呼んでいます。エクスプロレイターは代表団を遣わして財宝を要求していて、激しい論争が何日も続いている状態です」

「ロード・キャプテン、ファウルストーンで信じられないような発見がありました！聖セファの行方不明になっていた日記が地下墓地の修復中に発見されたのです。その記録によれば、鉄槌の修道会のメンバーは、聖コグナティウスの聖遺物...坩堝が入ったクリプトアークを発見することができたそうですよ。セファの書いた内容は不明瞭で、 それを、'生命と恩寵を与える彫刻家と変容者 'と呼んでいます。エクスプロレイターは代表団を遣わして財宝を要求していて、激しい論争が何日も続いている状態です」

languages.text: « On nous a signalé une découverte incroyable sur Rochepeste, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Un volume inconnu du journal perdu de Saint Keefe a été mis au jour lors de travaux de restauration de sa crypte. Selon les écrits du saint, les membres de l'Ordre du Marteau avaient réussi à retrouver la cryptoarche contenant une relique de Saint Cognatius : le Creuset. Keefe est avare de détails, mais il décrit tout de même ce dernier comme "le sculpteur et transformateur, source de vie comme de grâce". Les Explorators ont envoyé une délégation récupérer le trésor. Des échanges houleux durent depuis des jours. »
languages.original_text: "An incredible find has been made on Foulstone, Lord Captain! A lost volume of Saint Keefe's diary has been discovered during the restoration of his crypt. By following the saint's words, the Order of the Hammer was able to find a cryptoark containing a tech-relic of Saint Cognatius — the Crucible. Keefe's writings on it are vague: it is called 'the sculptor and transformer, granting life and grace.' The Explorators have sent a delegation to lay claim to the treasure, which has sparked a heated dispute that has been going on for many days."

traits.locale_text: « On nous a signalé une découverte incroyable sur Rochepeste, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Un volume inconnu du journal perdu de Saint Keefe a été mis au jour lors de travaux de restauration de sa crypte. Selon les écrits du saint, les membres de l'Ordre du Marteau avaient réussi à retrouver la cryptoarche contenant une relique de Saint Cognatius : le Creuset. Keefe est avare de détails, mais il décrit tout de même ce dernier comme "le sculpteur et transformateur, source de vie comme de grâce". Les Explorators ont envoyé une délégation récupérer le trésor. Des échanges houleux durent depuis des jours. »

languages.text: "Auf Foulstone wurde etwas Unglaubliches entdeckt, Lord Captain! Bei der Restauration seiner Gruft wurde ein Band des verschollenen Tagebuchs des Heiligen Keefe entdeckt. Indem der Orden des Hammers die Worte des Heiligen befolgte, fand er eine Kryptolade mit einer technologischen Reliquie von St. Cognatius ... den Tiegel. Keefes Aufzeichnungen sind vage, er spricht nur vom 'Erschaffer und Verwandler, der Leben und Gnade gewährt'. Die Exploratoren haben eine Delegation entsandt, um den Schatz für sich zu beanspruchen. Dies hat wiederum zu einem hitzigen Disput geführt, der nun schon seit vielen Tagen andauert."
languages.original_text: "An incredible find has been made on Foulstone, Lord Captain! A lost volume of Saint Keefe's diary has been discovered during the restoration of his crypt. By following the saint's words, the Order of the Hammer was able to find a cryptoark containing a tech-relic of Saint Cognatius — the Crucible. Keefe's writings on it are vague: it is called 'the sculptor and transformer, granting life and grace.' The Explorators have sent a delegation to lay claim to the treasure, which has sparked a heated dispute that has been going on for many days."

traits.locale_text: "Auf Foulstone wurde etwas Unglaubliches entdeckt, Lord Captain! Bei der Restauration seiner Gruft wurde ein Band des verschollenen Tagebuchs des Heiligen Keefe entdeckt. Indem der Orden des Hammers die Worte des Heiligen befolgte, fand er eine Kryptolade mit einer technologischen Reliquie von St. Cognatius ... den Tiegel. Keefes Aufzeichnungen sind vage, er spricht nur vom 'Erschaffer und Verwandler, der Leben und Gnade gewährt'. Die Exploratoren haben eine Delegation entsandt, um den Schatz für sich zu beanspruchen. Dies hat wiederum zu einem hitzigen Disput geführt, der nun schon seit vielen Tagen andauert."

"Auf Foulstone wurde etwas Unglaubliches entdeckt, Lord Captain! Bei der Restauration seiner Gruft wurde ein Band des verschollenen Tagebuchs des Heiligen Cephas gefunden. Laut seinen Aufzeichnungen haben die Mitglieder des Ordens des Hammers die Kryptolade mit einer Reliquie des Heiligen Cognatius entdeckt — den Tiegel. Cephas Aufzeichnungen sind vage, er spricht nur vom 'Erschaffer und Verwandler, der Leben und Gnade gewährt'. Die Exploratoren haben eine Delegation geschickt, die den Schatz bergen soll. Der erbitterte Streit läuft schon seit vielen Jahren."

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, Menfurtaş'ta inanılmaz bir keşif yapılmış! Aziz Keefe'nin mahzeninin yeniden yapılanması esnasında günlüğünün bir bölümü keşfedilmiş. Azizin sözlerini takip eden Çekiç Tarikatı mensupları, Aziz Cognatius'un bir tekno yadigârını içeren Pota adındaki kriptoarkı bulabilmiş. Keefe'nin bu hususta yazdıkları biraz muğlak. Bundan 'heykeltıraş ve dönüştürücü, hayat ve lütuf bahşeden' olarak bahsediyor. Keşiftörler, bir heyet göndererek hazine üzerinde hak iddia etmiş. Sonrasında kızışan tartışmaysa günlerdir sürmekteymiş."
languages.original_text: "An incredible find has been made on Foulstone, Lord Captain! A lost volume of Saint Keefe's diary has been discovered during the restoration of his crypt. By following the saint's words, the Order of the Hammer was able to find a cryptoark containing a tech-relic of Saint Cognatius — the Crucible. Keefe's writings on it are vague: it is called 'the sculptor and transformer, granting life and grace.' The Explorators have sent a delegation to lay claim to the treasure, which has sparked a heated dispute that has been going on for many days."

Azizin sözlerini takip eden Çekiç Tarikatı mensupları, Aziz Cognatius'un bir tekno yadigârını içeren Pota adındaki kriptoarkı bulabilmiş. Keefe'nin bu hususta yazdıkları biraz muğlak. Bundan 'heykeltıraş ve dönüştürücü, hayat ve lütuf bahşeden' olarak bahsediyor. Keşiftörler, bir heyet göndererek hazine üzerinde hak iddia etmiş. Sonrasında kızışan tartışmaysa günlerdir sürmekteymiş."
